abstracts.cdata!:
This environmental management plan for
            the Montreal Protocol Reduction of Ozone Depleting
            Substances Project identifies potential environmental risks
            and proposes measures to mitigate them. Risks expected from
            the operation of the plant's productive processes
            include hazardous substances, especially chemical
            substances. The report explains how solid, liquid, and
            gaseous wastes will be reprocessed, treated and disposed of
            through contractors; that is, equipment and machinery, and
            materials and by-products used in the production process.
